name: Fluffender
description:
• Just a cat, sitting in room. But the Reaper appears and you have to save the world once again. Get in your pad and defeat three powerfull demons with your speed, guns and ball of yarn.
  •   Pong, but with cat and guns. Little game for LD 44
  •   A to go left,  D to go right  Mouse to start, shoot and push buttons
